+ class Sidebar extends StatelessWidget {
+   /// é¸æŠä¸­ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ‡ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ã€‚
+   final int selectedIndex;
+   /// ã‚¢ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ ã‚¿ãƒƒãƒ—æ™‚ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã€‚
+   final ValueChanged<int>? onTap;
+ 
+   const Sidebar({
+     super.key,
+     this.selectedIndex = 0,
+     this.onTap,
+   });
+ 
+   @override
+   Widget build(BuildContext context) {
+     // ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ‰ãƒãƒ¼ã®ã‚¢ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ æƒ…å ±
+     final items = [
+       {
+         'icon': 'assets/icons/home_icon2.svg',
+         'label': 'ãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒ ',
+       },
+       {
+         'icon': 'assets/icons/folder_icon.svg',
+         'label': 'ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«',
+       },
+       {
+         'icon': 'assets/icons/settings_icon.svg',
+         'label': 'è¨­å®š',
+       },
+     ];
+ 
+     return Container(
+       width: 72,
+       height: double.infinity,
+       decoration: const BoxDecoration(
+         color: Color(0xFF3C1A6C),
+         boxShadow: [
+           BoxShadow(
+             color: Color(0x1A000000),
+             blurRadius: 8,
+             offset: Offset(2, 0),
+           ),
+         ],
+       ),
+       child: Column(
+         mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.start,
+         children: [
+           const SizedBox(height: 32),
+           // ã‚¢ã‚¤ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆ
+           for (int i = 0; i < items.length; i++)
+             _SidebarItem(
+               iconPath: items[i]['icon']!,
+               label: items[i]['label']!,
+               selected: i == selectedIndex,
+               onTap: () => onTap?.call(i),
+             ),
+           const Spacer(),
+           // ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‚¢ã‚¤ã‚³ãƒ³ï¼ˆä»®ï¼‰
+           Padding(
+             padding: const EdgeInsets.only(bottom: 24.0),
+             child: CircleAvatar(
+               radius: 20,
+               backgroundColor: const Color(0xFFD9D9D9),
+               child: SvgPicture.asset(
+                 'assets/icons/person_icon2.svg',
+                 width: 20,
+                 height: 20,
+                 colorFilter: const ColorFilter.mode(
+                   Color(0xFF645E6D),
+                   BlendMode.srcIn,
+                 ),
+               ),
+             ),
+           ),
+         ],
+       ),
+     );
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ class _SidebarItem extends StatelessWidget {
+   final String iconPath;
+   final String label;
+   final bool selected;
+   final VoidCallback? onTap;
+ 
+   const _SidebarItem({
+     required this.iconPath,
+     required this.label,
+     this.selected = false,
+     this.onTap,
+   });
+ 
+   @override
+   Widget build(BuildContext context) {
+     return GestureDetector(
+       onTap: onTap,
+       child: Container(
+         margin: const EdgeInsets.symmetric(vertical: 8),
+         decoration: BoxDecoration(
+           color: selected ? const Color(0xFF9B6ADF) : Colors.transparent,
+           borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(12),
+         ),
+         width: 48,
+         height: 48,
+         child: Center(
+           child: SvgPicture.asset(
+             iconPath,
+             width: 28,
+             height: 28,
+             colorFilter: ColorFilter.mode(
+               selected ? Colors.white : const Color(0xFFD9D9D9),
+               BlendMode.srcIn,
+             ),
+           ),
+         ),
+       ),
+     );
+   }
+ }
